#Extended FrSky LCD panel functionality.

= OSD_FrSky =

Main part of the mod is the added functionality of displaying the current state of the copter using Fuel Gauge located on the FrSky LCD screen.  

=== OSD_FrSky How-To ===

Instructions located inside the OSD_FrSky.pde file.
